name: The Player's Story: Demo
description:
Hello, welcome to Player's Story. After a, couple months in development, Hopefully it would have been worth the wait.

Player's Story is a game where you play as the Player. In the full game you will play through 9 different games with 9 different genres (crafting, puzzle, platformer etc)

read these instructions first

use the mouse to click the start buttons (or the arrow keys and enter if you're a psycho)
wasd:move
arrows:attack
1-2:switch weapons (bone, bow)
hold m: open map
hold n while opening map: see entire map
